title: Luxury Aparthotel for sale
details:
Luxury apartment hotel recently build on a 53 perch of land in the quit envirement of Palangahture East..
Hotelbuilding is 4 years old
Hotel(3-star) is family mined and mostly booked by families.
Hotel is current well running on diffenent markets.
Walking distance to the coastline and major hotels like Jetwing Blue .
Property is completely surrounded with a parapet wall of 3m high secured with a high definition camera system.
The propery has 4 blocks, each 4 apartments. Max. occupensy is 64 persons.
Outdoor pool ( child friendly)
Restaurant in-and outdoor.Coffee corner , Spacious carpark.
Public toilets , outdoor swimpool showers.
Office ,Staff & drivers accomodation for 4-5 persons
Land can be extend up to 110perches.
Many possiblilities to expand .
